programme.title: Living with anthrax
programme.short_synopsis: Amid scares of anthrax in the post, Alistair Cooke considers the emotional effect of 9/11.
programme.medium_synopsis: Whilst coping with the daily threat of possibly finding anthrax in the mail, Alistair Cooke reflects on how hope and fear are wrapped up within the 9/11 terrorist attacks.
